General.Name: Consus Enerji Isletmeciligi ve Hizmetleri AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Consus Enerji Isletmeciligi ve Hizmetleri A.S. operates as an energy service company in Turkey. It produces electricity through biomass, solar, and cogeneration/trigeneration plants. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Consus Enerji Isletmeciligi ve Hizmetleri A.S. is a subsidiary of Global Yatirim Holding A.S.
General.Address: Esentepe Mahallesi Büyükdere Caddesi 193, Istanbul, Turkey, 34394
